meanings.definition: A large group of galaxy clusters bound together by gravity.
meanings.sent1: The supercluster in space was made up of many galaxy clusters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a massive supercluster of galaxies in the universe.
meanings.sent3: The supercluster of galaxy clusters threw a party in outer space.
meanings.sent4: The supercluster loomed in the cosmos like a giant cosmic family.
meanings.sent5: The supercluster of galaxy clusters was a breathtaking sight in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A very large group of galaxies.
meanings.sent1: The supercluster contained countless galaxies within its boundaries.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers observed a supercluster of galaxies millions of light-years away.
meanings.sent3: The supercluster of galaxies decided to form a space choir.
meanings.sent4: The supercluster of galaxies shone brightly like a celestial city.
meanings.sent5: The supercluster of galaxies was a dazzling display of cosmic beauty.
